name: uberclass-clouseau
description: A subclass of uberclass that adds profiling support

scripts.prepublish: npm test && docco ./lib/uberclass-clouseau.js && uglifyjs ./lib/uberclass-clouseau.js > ./lib/uberclass-clouseau.min.js && git commit -am "Automatic doc and minification for version $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
